translator_object_735_description: Just like a Crab Pot but with fish!
translator_menu_gameplay_wateringxp_opti: Enable XP Gain when watering crops. Wild Seeds will give forage xp. Normal Crops will give farming xp.
translator_menu_grabber_slimehutch_optio: Configure if grabber works in your Slime Hutchs.
translator_menu_grabber_harvestcrops_opt: Configure if crops will be hasvested from your fields.
translator_menu_grabber_indoorpots_optio: Configure if itens will be hasvested form your Garden Pots.
translator_menu_grabber_artifact_option_: Configure if itens will be grabbed form artifact spots.
translator_menu_grabber_ore_option_toolt: Configure if ore will be grabbed from shimmering lights.
translator_menu_grabber_fruittree_option: Configure if fruits will be grabbed from fruit trees.
translator_menu_grabber_normaltree_optio: Configure if seeds will be grabbed from trees.
translator_menu_grabber_harvestflower_op: Configure if flower will be grabbed, both in your fields and garden pots.
translator_menu_grabber_trashcan_option_: Configure if itens will be grabbed from garbage cans in town.
translator_menu_tools_section_tooltip: Change here the blessed tools funcionatilies.
translator_menu_toollength_option_toolti: Change the length of iridium/blessed hoe and watering can. Only use integers.
translator_menu_toolwidth_option_tooltip: Change the width of iridium/blessed hoe and watering can. Only use integers.
translator_menu_soundloop_section_toolti: Allow Game Music Loop and fix no playing music in some maps.
translator_dialog_box_robin_busy: Wait until the construction team finishes the current construction to start another construction.
translator_ShopMenu.cs.11474: I can make your tools more powerful, right now!
translator_Tool.cs.14317: Thanks for the business. Here, enjoy your new tool!
translator_Robin_UpgradeConstruction_Fes: Okay, The construction team will working on your {1} upgrade the day after tomorrow. I always take festivals off.
translator_Robin_UpgradeConstruction: Okay, The construction team will working on your {1} upgrade first thing tomorrow morning!
translator_Robin_NewConstruction_Festiva: Okay, The construction team will working on your new {0} the day after tomorrow.
translator_Robin_NewConstruction: Okay, The construction team will working on your new {0} first thing tomorrow morning!
translator_Robin_Instant: This {0} is pre-fabricated, so there's no construction time! Convenient, isn't it?
translator_Robin_HouseUpgrade_Accepted: Thank you! We'll deliver your expansion in around three days.
